metadata.title: CVE-2019-10026 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an FPE in the functionPostScriptFunction::exec in Function.cc for the psOpRoll case.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.13').
